website_summaries.verdict: Although not 100% beeswax, these ergonomically designed crayons are non-toxic and safe for both children and adults.
pros: Triangular shape prevents crayons from rolling away
Blend of beeswax and petroleum improves flow
Contains 24 bold colors that work well on light and dark paper
cons: Ingredient list includes petrochemicals, not 100% beeswax

customer_reviews.title: Great color but product is misleading
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving this product 4 out of 5 is because the packaging in misleading. According to the International Arrivals website the ingredients for these are: Paraffin and Hydrocarbon waxes, stearic acid (pure), Talc (Mg3H2(SiO3)4), Hydrogenated Palm Oil, benzenamine (oxidized), Petrolatum, beeswax, Distillates (petroleum), hydrotreated light paraffinic, synthetic coloring. Beeswax is far on the ingredient list. However, the color of these are beautiful. My 15 month old love them. They glide easily on paper and the color payoff is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wikoff

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Photos and description are misleading, suggesting these are beeswax crayons. The crayon wrappings in the photos read "Beeswax" however the actual product wrapping does not. They are fair quality crayons that break easily and stained our hardwood floor (after toddler colored a lovely green picture in the living room) Pure beeswax crayons have not stained in the past. Ordering was easy and straight forward and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Softest to draw with, most vibrant colors and they dont break!
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST CRAYONS, Crayola has nothing on these. They draw soft vibrant colors but dont break like other crayons. We have never bought a different brand since grandma bought our Dd a set 6 years ago. And these are one if many of their amazing products, our other daily favorites are the rainy days window crayons, which are just like drawing with lipstick and who doesn't like that!!!! Those are also fun in the tub and the paint sticks by ooly. But these have always been our goto for gifts and such. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justyna A.

customer_reviews.title: Good color saturation but they are hollow.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I see with these is that they are hollow! I got them for my very little one to color with while her older sister is coloring. She bites everything so I wanted something non toxic and more natural. For me, these were a waste if money because if she bites them, they break into little "yummy" looking pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Katelin R.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it for someone who is looking specifically for bees' ...
customer_reviews.text: The crayons are NOT made out of bees' wax. There is SOME bees' wax added, but the rest of the ingredients are not mentioned. I would not recommend it for someone who is looking specifically for bees' wax crayons.
customer_reviews.author: ConsciousBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Brake apart easily
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: THE ARE NOT WASHABLE kids decided to draw on the wall and now I found out THEY ARE NOT WASHABLE Brake apart super easily...just from falling off the table....crumbling down:( Not happy. Kids prefer Stabilo woody
customer_reviews.author: Vlada

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but kind of cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and smoothness but the wrapper slides off as you put pressure to color. This became a game for my toddler and now there are a bunch of torn crayon wrappers everywhere and naked crayons. Kind of ruined the aesthetics of the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful. Affordable to begin to do Encaustics and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Affordable to begin to do Encaustics and they are bright colored. I wonder if you can buy individual crayon colors. I love them b
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B. McDonell, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set of Crayons
customer_reviews.text: My little one is ten months old and I'm just starting to introduce him to art, so I bought these crayons because everything still goes into his mouth. The colors are vibrant and they are relatively easy for him to hold. He had a great time trying to imitate me and color for the first time. While I don't let him eat them, I love that I don't have to be too concerned about him sticking them in his mouth from time to time. He's also dropped them multiple times on our hardwood floor and they did not break.
customer_reviews.author: stacers

customer_reviews.title: The colors are pretty and we enjoyed using them for a short while
customer_reviews.text: The colors are pretty and we enjoyed using them for a short while. However, they are really soft and quickly broke. we are left with thirds and quarter sized pieces that are hard for little hands to hold. While the Stockmar crayons don't have as many shades as this set does, they have lasted my kids for several of years as compared to these which only lasted a fee months.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid Colors - Just Watch Out For Your Walls
customer_reviews.text: Great product - just hard to get off of walls. So, watch your little artists. :D
customer_reviews.author: YouAreWhatYouWish

customer_reviews.title: The best crayons!
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through a lot of crayons for our two year old. She loves these, they are almost like markers, but without the mess. The colors are rich and thick. Best crayons!
customer_reviews.author: Seth and Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Bright
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice crayons; big, chunky form is easy to color with and the colors themselves are bright and bold. The wax is nice and soft and the colors lay on each other well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love gifting this for the 2-3 year olds in my life, bright colors and they seem to enjoy organizing the crayons in the case
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Nontoxic with richer colors and easier coloring. Plus they don't break easily!
customer_reviews.text: These crayons produce such richer colors and glide onto paper so much easier than cheap toxic crayola-type crayons. No broken crayon pieces, ever! I'm so grateful to have this non-toxic option for my little one. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DenaH

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Liked crayons! Assumed safe for 1 year old child, whom loves them for motor skill exploration/development and tactile experience. She does often put them in her mouth, especially when hungry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Webber

customer_reviews.title: Great Beeswax Crayons
customer_reviews.text: These are all around great for young artists. The colors and vivid, and they are easy for little hands to grasp.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ballard

customer_reviews.title: These crayons are amazing! My almost 2 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are amazing! My almost 2 year old loves them. They fit into his hands well, and I've been able to wipe the beeswax off of surfaces he's "accidentally" colored on. I've given these as little birthday presents as well, everyone always likes them. And I appreciate that they're nontoxic since they inevitably end to in one of the kids' mouths.
customer_reviews.author: C.N.B.

customer_reviews.title: These glide so nicely and the colors are beautifully vibrant
customer_reviews.text: These glide so nicely and the colors are beautifully vibrant. They clean up nicely off our floor with a little soap as well... ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but fragile
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these when we first got them. They are beautifully vibrant and color so easily and well. However, very quickly they started breaking and after just a month and a half of occasional use we have mainly just pieces and only a few whole crayons left. For fatter crayons designed for young children they need to be more durable. We have done stockmar crayons and while I like the vibrancy of these, the stockmar are all still whole.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: NOT BEESWAX
customer_reviews.text: Mea culpa for not looking at the reviews -- these are NOT beeswax crayons, but are crayons with beeswax in them. Huge difference. Then again, why should I have to read through reviews to find out that these aren't what they are labelled? Per the website (not Amazon listing): Crayon Wax Contains: Paraffin and Hydrocarbon waxes, stearic acid (pure), Talc (Mg3H2(SiO3)4), Hydrogenated Palm Oil, benzenamine (oxidized), Petrolatum, beeswax, Distillates (petroleum), hydrotreated light paraffinic, synthetic coloring. They do color smoothly and prettily, hence the two stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: TulipGirl

customer_reviews.title: Juicy and Bright Colors
customer_reviews.text: These crayons color like velvet. Nice choice of colors and they color so bright. They are easy to hold and can't roll. Worked great for my 2.5 year hold niece. Great quality, would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are easy of the kids to write with. Nice bold colors. They are the only crayons I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewPro2000

customer_reviews.title: great crayons, doesn't have that funky smell
customer_reviews.text: great crayons, doesn't have that funky smell, and generally doesn't feel as sticky and messy even if the wrappers are removed by your toddler :D
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W

customer_reviews.title: Vivid Colors, Nice Storage Box.
customer_reviews.text: I got these crayons for my kindergartner and he loves it. Colors are very bright and vivid and it runs very smooth on the paper. The box is very sturdy, unlike the other brands boxes which are thin and my son ruins it right away, So the box is a good storage and it is holding up very well. One thing though, I have noticed that the paper cover on crayons slips off easily and one time my son got tired and ripped it off :) That is the only thing that bothered me. Other wise excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Reera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright colors....that leaves me a bit suspicious how "natural" they can be, but we are enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Magic P.

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice to know they are non toxic in those just in case situations. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: sassyskis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The colors are bright and vibrant. The crayons are regular length but fat so it makes it easy for little hands to hold. I also love that it's made from beeswax because you know your toddler is going to try to eat them. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Color, durability, eco - Oh my!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent - & believe that they are easier to color with than Stockmar (at a much reduced price). Excellent color selection. Dropped from the kitchen island on tile & didn't break. Love that they are eco (more happy that they are "healthier" for my toddler).
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: DECEIVING
customer_reviews.text: It says "added beeswax" but did not list what is other ingredients. Smells awful
customer_reviews.author: moganakkumar

customer_reviews.title: Good colors though
customer_reviews.text: My LO has not died, after eating most of his crayons... Good colors though, instead of the normal faint coloring you see with beeswax crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: Nice colorful crayons
customer_reviews.text: Nice colorful crayons! My lil granddaughters had these at their house and I liked them so much I bought them too!
customer_reviews.author: imsamasmi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Little Hands
customer_reviews.text: These have such vibrant color and are perfect for little hands. They do break easily if dropped, but I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these crayons! They are so easy for her little hands to grab on to and hold. There is a good variety of colors that draw on paper very smoothly. I would definitely buy this product again! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smooth color!
customer_reviews.text: This all natural crayons come in an absolutely beautiful assortment of colors and are big enough for toddler hands yet small enough that mommy is comfortable color with them too! I was worried that these colors wouldnt go on smooth or that the wax would flake or come off unevenly (Like cheap rose art crayons) However, that is SO not the case. These colors are so smooth and vivid! Added bonus that they're made with TRULY non-toxic wax! I plan on keeping these in our home for years and years and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Pricing is bit off
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it. Great quality. Pricing is bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Sriram Sethumadhavan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality crayons
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality crayons, with a good selection of bright colors/shades. The box is nice as well, definitely felt like a step up or two from all of the crayolas we've churned through. Our little artists were excited to get to use them as well.
customer_reviews.author: scottw

customer_reviews.title: These crayons are BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: (Sorry, Amazon, I first found these at a local gift store that carried them for Christmas..) I sent them as a gift to my young nieces. They not only love them, but have created such beautiful art works that I purchased a set for myself - at a better price on Amazon - to use in my sketching and journaling.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edeburn

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice, kind of soft so the coloring is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, kind of soft so the coloring is easy for a little one. Crayons are triangle shaped so they don't fall off the table. My grand daughter and grand son both 2 love them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good crayons
customer_reviews.text: They are soft enough to color with slight pressure. They do not smell bad like other brand name crayons. One negative is that the paper wrapper around the crayon keeps sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: LAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our two year old. Not too greasy but still easy to draw with without needing to put a lot of pressure on to get the color on the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Larson

customer_reviews.title: Best crayons
customer_reviews.text: Love these crayons. Very bright and vibrant and easy to wipe off wall with a magic eraser.
customer_reviews.author: jennett

customer_reviews.title: Great kid crayons
customer_reviews.text: Great kid crayons! We've had ours for about a year and they are still going strong. They're pretty thick which is nice. And not round so they can travel with us and not roll off the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: Best crayons!
customer_reviews.text: My children have loved using these crayons. I was very pleasantly surprised at how vivid the colors were, how smooth they drew and how sturdy they are. My husband sat down one day to color with the boys and he was amazed also at how very nice they were. I don't think I will ever buy store brand crayons again! These are worth the extra expense to make your child's crafting and creating much more enjoyable. I have seen my boys both enjoy their coloring/drawing more and comment on how they love the "special crayons" I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, smooth color!
customer_reviews.text: Using these crayons is so enjoyable. Beautiful, smooth colors ...easy to use...love them! Best part is that the lift off lid of the box has an attached bungee-type band that holds the box together when closed! Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette W. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter because I wanted to have her use crayons that I knew were completely safe and were better fo rthe envrionment. They colors are so vibrant and the size of the crayons are perfect for her two year old hands. I will keep buying these everytime I see the old ones getting low.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons for little hands.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of crayons. I love that they are triangle shaped, so they don't roll off her desk.
customer_reviews.author: A. Niebruegge

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors! These beeswax crayons leave rich and lovely colors on the page, and they blend beautifuly (if you rub the picture with your fingers, the heat from your hand kindof melts the colors together). The crayons are thick, which makes them easier to hold if you are a small child. However if you are a supposed adult, the thickness makes it a little challenging to get the color into small areas so you must aim very carefully ;) I tested these out and enjoyed them enough that now I will have to purchase more for my nieces and nephews. Would have given them five stars if they would have come with a sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: flint5292

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such awesome crayons, makes me want to use them even though I bought them for my children!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant colors, indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the vibrant colors and size of crayon. Perfect for my one year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Best crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Love these crayons! They are the perfect size for my toddlers. They also do wipe off of many surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yager

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crayon colors and big enough for my two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Shirah Chante

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my granddaughter for Christmas because my daughter wanted something natural. My granddaughter likes them and their triangle shape keeps them from rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Best value in art supplies I have seen/
customer_reviews.text: These are the best crayons we have found. My kids are on their third or fourth box. Best value for the money, best colors available. Work like a charm and smooth to use. Great price. One of the best values in art supplies I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are great for small fingers. Our grandson is 3 and really enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Badgerow

customer_reviews.title: Daughter approved
customer_reviews.text: Knowing it’s chemical free and safe for babies was the thing I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long lasting. Much more vibrant color than traditional crayons. Daughter loves these. They work just as well as the more expensive brands too.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love these crayons. they are really great. Exactly as pictured and described and came very quickly but thats what you get with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy P.

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I got these for my son when he ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I got these for my son when he was 1 since he was still putting lots of things in his mouth. My only complaint is that they break really easily but that's not really a big deal to me. I enjoy using them too.
customer_reviews.author: Katroid

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great item for little artists. My 6yr old loves these! Goes on smooth and are very vibrant. Great buy and we would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OCMama

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. Make great birthday gifts for kids. Fun and unique color names.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, for my sister who is 26, and an artist. She loves the colors, I bought it for her to use in encaustic paintings.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are rich and the crayons write easily and smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Their value depends on how you use them!
customer_reviews.text: Specialized use; they don't have the viibrance of crayolas, but they melt pretty fast
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Brightest crayon color
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing quite like the brilliance of beeswax color. It is much brighter and bolder than regular commercial crayons. It also seems to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lennox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Non toxic crayons that actually work. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Soumya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these crayons and they are much safer than the standard brands.
customer_reviews.author: kelly c

customer_reviews.title: Great natural crayons!
customer_reviews.text: I became curious about crayons and looked up what they are made of/environmental impact...let's just say I will not be buying traditional crayons any more! These are a wonderful alternative, big crayons, seem like they will last a while and I don't have to worry about my little one putting them in her mouth! Would recommend for artists of all ages!
customer_reviews.author: MommaDance

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons!
customer_reviews.text: They are very vivid colors, thick, and best of all non toxic!! They have no odor. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are worth it! The richness of the colors will engage your budding artist. And the beeswax base makes a great product - great quality art product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST Crayons MADE
customer_reviews.text: Best crayons ever. No reason to spend any more or any less. Others not worth 1/2 the price. We always by these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good crayons
customer_reviews.text: These seem nice crayons. I have not tested them yet, but they seem pretty decent. For the price range I believe they will deliver a decent quanlity.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: These are the bees knees!
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging! The crayons themselves are great, I love that they are made from beeswax.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: We love these crayons!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old used these last year and we purchased another set this year. They color nicely, smell wonderful, and are a good size for little fingers to use. My 3 year old son also likes them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Vogel

customer_reviews.title: These are the best crayons. I don't believe I will be buying ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best crayons. I don't believe I will be buying any other crayons again. We have boughten these twice now and will continue to buy/use them.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Chipped easily when my daughter chewed on a crayon
customer_reviews.text: Chipped easily when my daughter chewed on a crayon. She's getting her molars and is chewing on objects again. My daughter was coloring as I was making dinner. I turned around and she was chewing on her crayon. The crayon chipped and a chunk of the crayon was in her mouth. Now I don't let her color with these crayons unless I sit next to her and ensure she doesn't put one in her mouth. After some time of using these crayons, a lot of the crayons tips have chipped in long chunks. I would not buy these crayons again.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The papers on these are very loose so my daughter tore some of them off. Once the paper is off, the crayon gets all over your hands. My daughters hands were completely covered in color after only coloring with these for a few minutes. I am definitely sticking with the P'kolino brand. Although this product was bad, Amazon gets 5 stars for there return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old granddaughter loved these crayons. The colors went down effortlessly and she was able to get them in and out of the box. I highly recommend them in place of Crayola.
customer_reviews.author: RhaposdyLei

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these crayons. Great size and wonderful colors for the little ones. Definitely high quality and my daughter is a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural crayon and wasn't expecting much but these exceeded my expectations These crayons are SO smooth almost like paint, colors are beautiful. Made me want to sit down and color with my kids and ignore my house work !
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa  Bybee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a crayon for my 15 month old that was toxic free and natural. These crayons are simply the best. Other. Brands were horrible and wouldn't write well. These come on a great package and easy to take along without the crayons falling out. Don't be hesitant get them!!
customer_reviews.author: Megamom

customer_reviews.title: Paper wrapping comes off easily and Color comes off on baby's palms, i guess thats not good. I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Paper wrapping comes off easily and Color comes off on baby's palms, i guess thats not good. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy to find out these expensive soy crayons are made in China, don't waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorinda Santos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it's Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I bought these crayons for my toddler after searching the net and concluding that the beeswax crayons would be safe for him. I chose this brand over the other brands amazon carries after checking the International Arrivals website and reading that their products are mostly made of recycled material and I was impressed. Nowhere on their site or in amazon's description of this product was it mentioned that these crayons were made in China! When it comes to my child, I prefer products manufactured in the US where I trust the regulations regarding children's safety and lead levels etc., esp when it comes to crayons that they might put in their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: HM

product_meta.title: OOLY, Natural Beeswax Crayons, Set of 24 (133-50)
product_meta.description: Bright, vivid, triangular shaped crayons! Natural beeswax makes these crayons fun, comfortable and easy to use. Set of 24 non-toxic crayons.
feature_bullets: ERGONOMIC: Thick and triangular shaped for a great ergonomic fit. Roll away crayons are a thing of the past.
BOLD COLORS: Bright, vivid and triangular shaped crayons; Brilliant Bee Crayons have it all. When you're coloring with Brilliant Bee Crayons you can bet that your art will stand out.
VERSATILITY: Brilliant Bees work great on black paper too.
USABILITY: The colors lay smoothly on paper and are thick for easy use.
PORTABLE: Beautiful box creates easy portability for crayons to go with you on-the-go. Bring with you anywhere and everywhere!
